title: The Thighmaster and Infomercial Fitness
description: One-minute skill: The Thighmaster and Infomercial Fitness.

hook.text: In 1991, Suzanne Somers squeezed a spring between her knees on TV. Ten million Thighmasters flew off shelves.

buildup.text: Infomercials made fitness gadgets mainstream. Ab rollers, shakers, and electrostimulators all had their moment.

climax.text: Infomercial fitness peaked in the 1990s. The internet eventually exposed the gap between claims and reality.

punchline.text: Infomercials sold millions of gadgets. Results weren't included in the box.
